blocks.title: Justia at Google’s I/O Conference
blocks.description: Nick, one of our engineers, attended Google's annual developer conference at Shoreline Amphitheatre, just a short walk from our headquarters in Mountain View. The conference covered all the latest advancements from Google, including topics such as AMP improvements, HTTPS, and structured data. Nick has attended Google I/O every year since it began back in 2007.

blocks.title: Cheering on the Warriors Into the Finals!
blocks.description: We’ve had a blast watching the Warriors go undefeated into this year’s NBA finals! Here is our CEO Tim with good friend and client Mark Hartsoe at a recent game. Let’s go, Warriors!
